long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will provide your daily dosis of Shrek whenever you need it. For that you just need to click on the extension icon, click on the 'Shrek' button and a GIF of Shrek will appear. Click again on the button to change the GIF. 

Enjoy the extension. It’s gonna be champagne wishes and caviar dreams from now on.
